Text:
Many Thanks to uploader, psspss!!!

Great work m8!
if you have to stop sharing some shows that is no prob at all, you have given us so much.

these arent my converts or rips.. I renamed with title and date though..

so no reason why others couldnt source and share here for all as well since 100s seem to like this show

I like storage wars better then this one and hollywood treasure myself :)

UPDATE 14-Jul.. seems these arent double episodes after all but
2nd one is a old season repeat episode ..
so rename the E15-E16 to E15 and E17-E18 to E16 then
it will work out fine with numbering
